link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd https://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2022-03-24/ifrs-smes ../../../../../ext/ifrs_for_smes/ifrs_for_smes-cor_2022-03-24.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.ssm.com.my/taxonomy/2022-12-31/ssmt-mpers-cor ../../../ssmt-mpers-cor/ssmt-mpers-cor_2022-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt http://www.xbrl.org/2005/xbrldt-2005.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/instance http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-instance-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.xbrl.org/2003/XLink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xl-2003-12-31.xsd http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xlink-2003-12-31.xsd

gen:link.msg:message: Kindly report valid 8 character Audit firm number starting with "AF00" followed by valid numericals e.g. AF001800
Sila laporkan nombor firma audit 8 karakter yang sah bermula dengan "AF00" diikuti dengan angka yang sah e.g. AF001800
Kindly report valid 6 character Audit firm number starting with "AF" followed by valid numericals e.g. AF1621
Sila laporkan nombor firma audit 6 karakter yang sah bermula dengan "AF" diikuti dengan angka yang sah e.g. AF1621
Kindly report valid Audit firm number
Sila laporkan nombor firma Audit yang sah
"New Company registration number" MUST be reported.
"Nombor pendaftaran syarikat baharu" MESTI dilaporkan
Name of company MUST be reported.
Nama syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
Origin of company MUST be reported
Asal syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
Status of company MUST be reported
Status syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
Type of company MUST be reported
Jenis syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
Company's current financial year start date MUST be reported
Tarikh mula tahun kewangan semasa Syarikat MESTI dilaporkan.
Company's current financial year end date MUST be reported
Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan semasa syarikat MESTI dilaporkan
Disclosure of financial statements audit status MUST be reported
Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan MESTI dilaporkan.
Status of carrying on business during the financial year MUST be reported
Status menjalankan perniagaan sepanjang tahun kewangan MESTI dilaporkan.
Basis of accounting standards applied to prepare the financial statements MUST be reported
Asas piawaian perakaunan yang diguna pakai untuk penyediaan penyata kewangan MESTI dilaporkan.
When filer selects Type of company as Company limited by guarantee THEN Basis of accounting standards applied to prepare the financial statements should be Malaysian Financial Reporting Standards

Apabila pemfail memilih "Jenis syarikat" adalah "Company limited by guarantee" KEMUDIAN "Asas piawaian perakaunan yang diguna pakai untuk penyediaan penyata kewangan" hendaklah "Malaysian Financial Reporting Standards"
When filer selects from Basis of accounting standards applied to prepare the financial statements as Others THEN Disclosure of other accounting standards applied MUST be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih daripada "Asas piawaian perakaunan yang diguna pakai untuk penyediaan penyata kewangan" sebagai "Others" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan piawaian perakaunan lain yang digunakan" MESTI dilaporkan
Type of submission MUST be reported
Jenis serahan MESTI dilaporkan.
Nature of financial statements MUST be reported
Jenis penyata kewangan MESTI dilaporkan.
Level of rounding used in financial statements MUST be reported
Tahap pembundaran yang digunakan dalam penyata kewangan MESTI dilaporkan.
Disclosure of financial statements preparation for current submission MUST be reported
Pendedahan penyediaan penyata kewangan untuk penyerahan semasa MESTI dilaporkan

When filer selects "Disclosure of financial statements preparation for current submission" as "Subsequent preparation of financial statements" THEN "Company's previous financial year start date" and "Company's previous financial year end date" are mandatory to be reported

Apabila pemfail memilih "Pendedahan penyediaan penyata kewangan untuk penyerahan semasa" sebagai ""Subsequent preparation of financial statements" KEMUDIAN "Tarikh mula tahun kewangan sebelumnya bagi syarikat" dan "Tarikh akhir tahun kewangan sebelumnya bagi syarikat " wajib dilaporkan
When filer selects Status of company as Public company THEN Disclosure of financial statements audit status should be Audited
Apabila pemfail memilih "Status syarikat" adalah "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" hendaklah sentiasa "Audited"
When filer selects Status of company is Private company and Disclosure of financial statements audit status is Unaudited THEN Description of audit exemption category MUST be reported
Apabila pemfail memilih "Status syarikat" adalah "Private company" dan "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" adalah "Unaudited" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan kategori pengecualian audit" MESTI dilaporkan
When filer selects Status of company is Public company THEN Basis of accounting standards applied to prepare the financial statements should be Malaysian Financial Reporting Standards

Apabila pemfail memilih "Status syarikat" adalah "Public company" KEMUDIAN "Asas piawaian perakaunan yang digunakan untuk menyediakan penyata kewangan"hendaklah "Malaysian Financial Reporting Standards"

va:valueAssertion.test: $V4 eq "Zero-revenue company" or $V4 eq "Threshold-Qualified company" or $V4 eq "Dormant company"

gen:link.msg:message: When filer selects "Status of company" is "Private company" AND "Disclosure of financial statements preparation for current submission" is "Subsequent preparation of financial statements" AND "Disclosure of financial statements audit status" is "Unaudited" THEN "Description of audit exemption category" should be either "Zero-revenue company" or "Threshold-Qualified company" or "Dormant company"

Apabila pemfail memilih "Status syarikat" adalah "Private company" DAN "Pendedahan penyediaan penyata kewangan untuk penyerahan semasa" adalah "Subsequent preparation of financial statements" DAN "Pendedahan status audit penyata kewangan" adalah "Unaudited" KEMUDIAN "Penerangan kategori pengecualian audit " hendaklah sama ada "Zero-revenue company" atau "Threshold-Qualified company" atau "Dormant company"

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq "Private company" and $V2 eq "Subsequent preparation of financial statements" and $V3 eq "Unaudited"

gen:link.msg:message: When user selects "Application of submission" as "Rectification filing with court order" or "Court order filing" THEN "Court Order reference number" MUST be reported
Apabila pemfail memilih "Permohonan serahan" sebagai "Rectification filing with court order" atau "Court order filing" KEMUDIAN "Nombor rujukan Perintah Mahkamah" MESTI dilaporkan

variable:precondition.test: $V1 eq "Rectification filing with court order" or $V1 eq "Court order filing"

gen:link.msg:message: When user selects "Application of submission" as "Rectification filing" THEN "Statutory Declaration for rectification" MUST be reported
Apabila pemfail memilih "Permohonan serahan" sebagai "Rectification filing" KEMUDIAN "Akuan Berkanun untuk pembetulan" MESTI dilaporkan
Name and version of software used to generate XBRL file MUST be reported.
Nama dan versi perisian yang digunakan untuk menjana fail XBRL MESTI dilaporkan.
Taxonomy version MUST be reported
Versi taksonomi MESTI dilaporkan
Description of presentation currency MUST be reported.
Penerangan mengenai pembentangan mata wang MESTI dilaporkan.
